262a6(mdo 'grel): dang/ ma nor bar bstan pa ste/ 'di ltar mi gtsang ba'i rnam pa dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshangs pa'i rnam par spyod pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang/ gzhan yang 'jig
262a7(mdo 'grel): rten pa'i chos byis pa so so'i skye po dag dang thun mong du gyur pa rnams te/ rab 'byor de ni 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa de btang nas
262b1(mdo 'grel): rnam grangs du mas 'jig rten gyi chos rnams ma nor bar blangs ba de las bskyod de/ de dag las bskyod nas/ thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos rnams dang/ 'phags pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu dag la rab tu 'god do/ /de la 'phags pa'i chos rnamS
262b2(mdo 'grel): ni gang/ 'phags pa'i chos kyi 'bras bu ni gang zhe na/ 'phags pa'i chos zhes bya ba ni byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum mo/ /'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu
262b3(mdo 'grel): dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /dgra bcom pa nyid de/ rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos ni rgyan du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu shes pa'o/ /lan cig phyir
262b4(mdo 'grel): 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o/ /phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu shes pa'o/ /dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu nyid shes pa'o/ /? pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o/ /bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
262b5(mdo 'grel): brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shes pa'o/ /nang? stong pa nyid des? dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du shes pa'o/ /byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun shes pa'o/
262b6(mdo 'grel): 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma
262b7(mdo 'grel): med pa dang/ smon pa med ba dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams shes pa'o/ /ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams shes pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ sangs
263a1(mdo 'grel): rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad shes pa'o/ /byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ dga' ba chen po dang/ btang snyoms chen po shes pa'o/ /gzhan yang 'jig rten pa dang/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i
263a2(mdo 'grel): chos dang/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams dang/ 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams shes pa ste/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes ma rtogs pa de dag byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
263a3(mdo 'grel): po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu gang zhe na/ bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad spong ba'o/ /'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 
263a4(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po'i 'phags pa'i chos rnams kyi 'bras bu'o/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ci lags/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos
263a5(mdo 'grel): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ram/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur ro//
263a6(mdo 'grel): gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par 'gyur na/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bye brag ni ci zhig
263a7(mdo 'grel): mchis bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ bye brag yod do/ /gsol pa/ bye brag ni ji lta bu zhig mchis/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid thob par
263b1(mdo 'grel): 'gyur ba'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni ye shes brnyes pa zhes bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ gang la gnas shing chos thams cad ? pa med pa thob pa la byang chub sems dpa' i sems kyang gzhan la/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang
263b2(mdo 'grel): dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi thugs kyang gzhan zhes bya ba med do/ /rab 'byor de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa ste/ de la brten pas 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa 'byung ngo/ /rab
263b3(mdo 'grel): 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams 'jig rten pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa la sbyor zhing thabs mkhas pas 'phags pa'i chos 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sbyin pa la bkod nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa
263b4(mdo 'grel): nyid kyi bar la 'god pa yin no zhes bya ba ni mi'i 'gro ba zhi bar mdzad pa'i phrin las yin no// //rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i cho skyi sbyin pa byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad dang
263b5(mdo 'grel): thun mong ma yin pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi dang/ yang dag par spong ba bzhi dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi dang/ dbang po lnga dang/ stobs lnga dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag bdun dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad
263b6(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ zad par gyi skye mched bcu dang/ zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad dang/ nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ smon nas
263b7(mdo 'grel): shes pa dang/ mngon par shes pa drug dang/ yongs su dag pa bzhi dang/ dbang bcu dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ bsrung ba med pa gsum dang/ dran pa nye bar gzhag pa
264a1(mdo 'grel): gsum dang/ nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid dang/ bag chags yang dag par bcom pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
264a2(mdo 'grel): dang/ skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dang/ gzungs kyi sgo lnga brgya dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnams te/ de dag ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor de la dran
264a3(mdo 'grel): pa nye bar gzhag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ nang gi lus dang/ phyi'i lus dang/ phyi nang gi lus la lus kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba
264a4(mdo 'grel): rnam par bsal zhing rnam par spyed do/ /lus la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /lus la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /lus la kun 'byung ba dang zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam pa spyod do/ /lus la mi gnas par
264a5(mdo 'grel): rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang la yang nye bar len pa med do/ /nang gi tshor ba dang/ phyi'i tshor ba dang/ phyi nang gi tshor ba dang/ nang gi sems dang/ phyi'i sems dang/ phyi nang gi sems dang/ nang gi chos dang/ phyi'i chos dang/ phyi nang
264a6(mdo 'grel): gi chos la chos kyi rjes su lta zhing brtson 'grus can shes bzhin dang ldan pa dran pa dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi chags sems dang yid mi bde ba rnam par bsal zhing rnam par spyod do/ /chos la kun 'byung ba'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par
264a7(mdo 'grel): spyod do/ /chos la zad pa'i rjes su lta zhing rnam par spyod do/ /chos la mi gnas par rnam par spyod cing 'jig rten du gang yang nye bar len pa med do/ /rab 'byor yang dag par spong ba bzhi gang zhe na/ sdig to mi dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa
264b1(mdo 'grel): rnams mi bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa bskyed pa dang/ skyes pa rnam par spong ba'i phyir rtsol ba dang/ dge ba'i chos ma skyes pa rnams bskyed pa'i phyir mos pa bskyed cing brtson 'grus rtsom pa dang/ skyes pa rnams shin du 'phel zhing shin tu rgyas par bya ba dang
264b2(mdo 'grel): sgom pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir mos pa bskyed pa'o/ /rab 'byor rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi gang zhe na/ mos pa'i ting nge 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ sems dang/ brtson 'grus dang/ spyod pa'i ting nge
264b3(mdo 'grel): 'dzin spong ba'i 'du byed dang ldan pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa'o/ /rab 'byor dbang po lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i dbang po dang/ brtson 'grus kyi dbang po dang/ dran pa'i dbang po dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po dang/ shes rab kyi dbang po'o/ /de dag
264b4(mdo 'grel): ni dbang po lnga zhes bya'o/ /stobs lnga gang zhe na/ dad pa'i stobs dang/ brtson 'grus kyi stobs dang/ dran pa'i stobs dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs dang/ shes rab kyi stobs te/ de dag ni stobs lnga zhes pa'o/ /rab 'byor byang chub kyi yan lag
264b5(mdo 'grel): bdun gang zhe na/ dran pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ chos rnam par 'byed pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ brtson 'grus yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ dga' ba yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ shin du
264b6(mdo 'grel): spyangs pa yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ ting nge 'dzin yang dag byang chub yan lag dang/ btang snyoms yang dag byang chub kyi yan lag ste/ de dag ni byang chub kyi yan lag bdun zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor 'phags pa'i lam yan
264b7(mdo 'grel): lag brgyad pa gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ yang dag pa'i lta ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rtog pa dang/ yang dag pa'i ngag dang/ yang dag pa'i las kyi mdza' dang/ yang dag pa'i 'tsho ba dang/ yang dag pa'i rtsol ba dang/ yang dag pa'i dran pa dang/ yang dag 
265a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i ting nge 'dzin te/ de dag ni 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad ces bya'o/ /de la ting nge 'dzin gsum gang zhe na/ stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/
265a2(mdo 'grel): /smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin to/ /stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ stong pa'i rnam pa dang/ dben pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni stong pa nyid kyi ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o/ /mtshan ma med pa'i
265a3(mdo 'grel): ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ zhi ba'i rnam pa dang/ mtshan ma med pa'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni mtshan ma med pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o/ /smon pa med ba'i ting nge 'dzin gang zhe na/ mi rtag pa'i rnam pa dang/ sdug bsngal
265a4(mdo 'grel): ba'i rnam par sems rtse gcig pa ste/ de ni smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin zhes bya'o/ /rnam par thar pa brgyad gang zhe na /gzugs can gyi gzugs rnams mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa dang po'o/ /nang gzugs med pa'i 'du shes
265a5(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pas phyi rol gyi gzugs thams cad mthong ba 'di ni rnam par thar pa gnyis pa'o/ /bzlang? bar mos pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa gsum ba'o/ /nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par
265a6(mdo 'grel): thar pa bzhi po'i /rnam shes mdza' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa lnga pa'o/ /cung rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /'du shes med 'du shes rnam par thar pa drug pa'o/ /'du shes med 'du shes
265a7(mdo 'grel): med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar pa bdun pa'o/ /'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas pa 'di ni rnam par thar ba brgyad pa ste/ de dag ni rnam par thar pa brgyad ces bya'o/ /mthar gyis
265b1(mdo 'grel): gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu gang zhe na/ 'di la la la 'dod pas dben sdig to mi dge ba'i chos kyi dben pa/ rtog pa dang bcas pa/ de dpyod pa dang bcas pa/ dben pa las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan dang po la nye bar bsgrubs
265b2(mdo 'grel): te gnas so/ /rnam par rtog pa dang/ rnam par dpyod pa nye bar zhi nas nang yongs su dang ste/ sems kyi rgyud gcig tu gyur pa rtog pa med pa dpyod pa med pa/ ting nge 'dzin las skyes pa'i dga' ba dang bde ba can/ bsam gtan gnyis pa la nye bar
265b3(mdo 'grel): bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de dga' ba las 'dod chags dang bral bas dran pa dang ldan zhing shes bzhin du btang snyoms su gnas te/ bde ba lus kyis myong la 'phags pa rnams kyis dran pa dang ldan pa bde ba la rnam par dpyod pa btang snyoms
265b4(mdo 'grel): pa'o zhes brjod pa ste/ dga' ba med pa'i bsam gtan gsum pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de bde ba yang spangs sdug bsngal ba yang spangs shing yid bde ba dang mi bde ba snga nas kyang nub pas bde ba yang med sdug bsngal ba yang med pa btang
265b5(mdo 'grel): snyoms dang dran pa yongs su dag pa/ bsam gtan bzhi pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du gzugs kyi 'du shes las yang dag par 'das te/ thogs pa'i 'du shes rnams nub par gyur cing/ sna tshogs kyi 'du shes yid la
265b6(mdo 'grel): mi byed pas nam mkha' yas so zhes/ nam mkha' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ rnam par shes pa mdza' yas so zhes rnam shes
265b7(mdo 'grel): mdza' yas skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du rnam shes mdza' yas skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ cung zad ma yod do zhes cung zad med pa'i skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du
266a1(mdo 'grel): cung zad med pa'i skye mched las yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /de rnam pa thams cad du 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched las
266a2(mdo 'grel): yang dag par 'das te/ 'du shes dang/ tshor ba 'gog pa la nye bar bsgrubs te gnas so/ /'di ni mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu zhes bya'o/ /de la zad par gyi skye mched bcu gang zhe na/ zad par sa dang/ zad par
266a3(mdo 'grel): chu dang/ zad par me dang/ zad par rlung dang/ zad par sngon po dang /zad par ser po dang /zad par dmar po dang/ zad par dkar po dang /zad par rnam bar shes pa dang/ zad par nam mkha' ste/ de dag ni zad bar gyi skye mched bcu zhes bya'o//
266a4(mdo 'grel): de la zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad gang zhe na/ nang gzugs su 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang/ ka dog sdug pa dang/ kha dog sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan ta mthong zhing/ de ltar 'du
266a5(mdo 'grel): shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched dang po'o/ /nang gzugs su 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang/ kha dog mi sdug ba dang/ kha dog sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mdzod?
266a6(mdo 'grel): zhing de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gnyis pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs phra mo dang/ kha dog sdug pa dang /kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes
266a7(mdo 'grel): zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes pa da ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched gsum pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs rags pa dang/ kha dog sdug pa dang/ kha dog mi sdug pa mthong yang gzugs
266b1(mdo 'grel): de dag gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing de ltar 'du shes bde ni zil gyis gnan ba'i? skye mched bzhi ba'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs sngon po/ kha dog sngon po/ sngon por snang ba/ mdog sngon po ?? ji
266b2(mdo 'grel): lta ste/ dper na/ me tog o ma ka lta buAm/ yul ba ra NA sir byas ba'i gos ltar sngo pa/ sngon po kha dog sngo ba/ sngon por snang ba/ mdog sngo ba mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing /de ltar 'du shes
266b3(mdo 'grel): pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched lnga pa'o/ /nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs ser po/ kha dog ser po/ ser por snang ba/ mdog ser po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ shing karshi ka ra'i me tog lta buAm/ yul ba ra NA sir
266b4(mdo 'grel): byas pa'i gos ltar ser pa/ kha dog ser ba/ ser bar snang ba/ mdog ser ba mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes /zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing/ de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis mnan pa'i skye mched drug pa'o/ /nang
266b5(mdo 'grel): gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzuD dmar po/ /dog dmar /dmar por snang ba/ mdog dmar po 'di lta ste/ dper na/ mandU? dzI ba ka'i/ me tog lta bu 'am/ yul bar NA sir byas pa'i gos ltar dmar ba/ kha dog dmar po/ dmar bar snang ba/
266b6(mdo 'grel): mdog dmar bar mthong yang gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing/ de ltar 'du shes pa 'di ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched bdun pa'o/ nang gzugs med par 'du shes shing phyi rol gyi gzugs
266b7(mdo 'grel): dkar po/ kha dog dkar po/ dkar por snang ba /mdog dkar ba 'di lta ste/ dper na/ skad ma pa ba sangs kyi 'od lta bu 'am/ yul bar NA sir byas pa'i gos ltar dkar ba/ kha dog dkar ba/ dkar por snang ba/ mdog dkar bar mthong yang
267a1(mdo 'grel): gzugs de dag zil gyis mnan te shes/ zil gyis mnan te mthong zhing/ de ltar 'du shes pa de ni zil gyis gnon pa'i skye mched brgyad pa'o/ /de la nyon mongs pa med pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas
267a2(mdo 'grel): nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams rnam par spyod pa sems can pha rol dang gang zag pha rol gyi nyon mongs pa mi skye ba'i mthu yod pa ting nge 'dzin gang gis 'grub pa de ni nyon mongs pa med pa zhes bya'o/ /smon lam
267a3(mdo 'grel): gyi shes pa gang zhe na/ bsam gtan la gnas te 'di shes par bya'o zhes byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dus gsum gyi shes pa'am/ shes pa gang dang gang 'dod par 'gyur ba de la yid kyis smon par byed do /ting nge 'dzin de las
267a4(mdo 'grel): langs nas de'i smon laM? de yongs su grub par gyur zhing shes byed bar shes pa de smon laM gyi shes pa zhes bya'o/ /de la mngon par shes pa drug gang zhe na/ rdzu 'phrul gyi mngon par shes pa dang/ lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa dang/ lha'i rna ba'i mngon
267a5(mdo 'grel): par shes pa dang/ pha rol gyi sems shes pa'i mngon par shes pa dang/ sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa'i mngon par shes pa dang/ zag pa zad pa'i mngon par shes pa ste drug po de dag go /de la yongs su dag pa bzhi gang zhe na/ lus
267a6(mdo 'grel): yongs su dag pa dang/ dmigs pa yongs su dag pa dang/ sems yongs su dag pa dang/ ye shes yongs su dag pa ste bzhi po de dag go/ de la dbang bcu gang zhe na/ tshe la dbang ba dang/ sems la dbang ba dang/ yo byad la dbang ba dang/ las
267a7(mdo 'grel): la dbang ba dang/ skye ba la dbang ba dang /mos pa la dbang ba dang /smon lam la dbang ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul la dbang ba dang/ ye shes la dbang ba dang /chos la dbang ba ste/ bcu po de dag go /rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs
267b1(mdo 'grel): bcu gang zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la de bzhin gshegs pa ni gnas la yang gnas su yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /gnas ma yin pa la yang gnas ma yin par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /'das pa dang
267b2(mdo 'grel): ma 'ongs pa dang da ltar byung ba'i las dang las yongs su blangs pa'i rnam par smin pa gnas kyi rnam pa dang rgyu'i rnam par yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /khams sna tshogs can dang khams du ma can gyi 'jig rten yang dag pa ji lta ba
267b3(mdo 'grel): bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi mos pa sna tshogs dang mos pa du ma yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /sems can gzhan dang gang zag gzhan gyi dbang po rab dang tham shes par bya
267b4(mdo 'grel): ba yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /kun tu 'gro ba'i lam yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/
267b5(mdo 'grel): snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs ba dang/ rnam par byang ba rnam par dgod pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs te/ tshe rabs gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/ tshe rabs brgya dang/ tshe rabs
267b6(mdo 'grel): stong dang/ tshe rabs brgya stong dang/ tshe rabs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi bar du yang rjes su dgongs so/ /bskal pa gcig kyang rjes su dgongs pa nas/ bskal pa brgya'i bar dang/ bskal pa brgya phrag du ma dang/ bskal ba brgya stong phrag du ma dang/
267b7(mdo 'grel): bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma'i bar dag kyang rjes su dgongs te/ bdag ni 'di lta bu zhig na 'dug 'dug go/ ming ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/ /rigs ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur te/ /rus ni 'di zhes bya bar gyur to/ /zas ni 'di lta bu
268a1(mdo 'grel): zhig za za'o/ /yun ni 'di srid cig tu gnas gnas so/ /che'i mdza' ni 'di tsam zhig tu gyur te/ bdag de nas tshe 'phos nas che ge mo zhig tu skyes so/ /zhes bya ba'i bar du rnam pa dang bcas/ sa ma la dang bcas/
268a2(mdo 'grel): gtan tshigs dang bcas pa rnam pa du mar sngon gyi gnas rjes su dgongs so/ /lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las 'das pas/ sems can 'chi 'pho ba dang/ skye ba dag kyang gzigs so/ /kha dog sdug pa dang/ mi sdug pa dang/ bzang ba dang/ ngan
268a3(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ bde 'gro na 'khod pa dang/ ngan 'gro na 'khod pa dang/ las ji lta ba bzhin du nye bar 'dong ba'i sems can rnams rab tu mkhyen te/ sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ dag gi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa dang/
268a4(mdo 'grel): yid kyi ngan du spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs pa/ log par lta ba dag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas ngan song log par ltung bar sems can dmyal bar skye'o/ /sems can 'di dag ni lus kyi legs
268a5(mdo 'grel): par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ dag gi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ yid kyi legs par spyod pa dang ldan pa/ 'phags pa la skur pa mi 'debs pa yang dag pa lta bdag ste/ de'i rgyu de'i rkyen gyis lus zhig nas bde 'gro mtho
268a6(mdo 'grel): ris kyi 'jig rten lha'i nang du skye'o zhes bya bar rab tu mkhyen to/ /zag pa rnams zad pa'i phyir sems rnam par grol ba dang/ shes rab rnam par grol ba dang/ zag pa med pa yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu mkhyen to/ /bcu po de dag ni de
268a7(mdo 'grel): gshegs pa'i stobs so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi 'jigs pa bzhi gang zhe na/ bdag gis yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so zhes dam bcas na /'di la chos gang yang mngon par sangs rgyas so zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong ngam/
268b1(mdo 'grel): dram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud ram /tshangs pa 'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag pa rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag pa rjes su mthong bas bdag bde ba thob pa dang /dag?
268b2(mdo 'grel): tshab? med pa thog pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa thob pa rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge sbyong ngam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs
268b3(mdo 'grel): pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor par mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /bdag zag pa zad do/ /zhes dam bcas na/ de la zag pa 'di rnams yongs su zad par ma gyur te zhes bya bar bdag la dge sbyong dam/ bram
268b4(mdo 'grel): ze 'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong bas/ de la bdag bde ba
268b5(mdo 'grel): thob pa dang/ bag tshab med pa thob pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa thob pa rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge spyod dam/ bram ze'am/ lha 'am/ bdud
268b6(mdo 'grel): dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste chos dang ldan par bskor bar mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /gang yang bdag gis bar chad kyi chos su bstan pa de dag la brten na bar chad kyi chos su mi 'gyur zhes dge sbyong
268b7(mdo 'grel): dam/ bram za 'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ skyed gu'i chogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten na chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong pas pa'o?
269a1(mdo 'grel): bdag bde ba thob pa dang/ bag tsha ba med pa thob pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa thob pa rnam par spyod de/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra sgrag go /tshangs pa'i 'khor
269a2(mdo 'grel): lo 'jig rten na dge spyod dam/ bram ze'am/ lha'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa'am/ gzhan su yang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor bar ma nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o/ /gang yang bdag gis lam 'phags pa'i 'byung ba
269a3(mdo 'grel): rtogs par 'gyur ba de byang pa'i sdug bsngal yang dag par zad par 'gyur bar bstan pa de dag la nan tan byas na sdug bsngal yang dag par zad pa 'byung bar mi 'gyur zhes dge sbyong dam/ bram ze'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs
269a4(mdo 'grel): pa'am/ skye dgu'i tshogs gzhan su yang rung ste/ 'jig rten ne chos dang ldan par rgol bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i rgyu yang dag par rjes su mi mthong ste/ rgyu yang dag par rjes su ma mthong bas de la bdag bde ba thob pa dang/ bag tsha ba med
269a5(mdo 'grel): pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa thob pas rnam par spyod do/ khyu mchog rlabs po che'i gnas su dam bca' o/ /'khor gyi nang du seng ge'i sgra bsgrag go/ tshangs pa'i 'khor lo 'jig rten na dge spyod dam/ bram ze 'am/ lha 'am/ bdud dam/ tshangs pa/
269a6(mdo 'grel): 'am/ gzhan sus kyang rung ste/ chos dang ldan par bskor par mi nus pa bdag gis rab tu bskor bar bya'o zhes bya ba ste bzhi po de dag ni mi 'jigs pa'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi gang zhe na /'di lta ste
269a7(mdo 'grel): /don so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ chos so so yang dag par rig pa dang /nges pa'i tshig so so yang dag par rig pa dang/ spobs pa so so yang dag par rig pa ste/ de dag kyang gang
269b1(mdo 'grel): zhe na/ don la dmigs pa dang/ chos la dmigs pa dang /nges pa'i tshig la dmigs pa dang/ spobs pa la dmigs pa'o/ /rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsrung ba med pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni sku'i spyod pa yongs su dag pa? dang
269b2(mdo 'grel): ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la sku'i sbyod pa yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas la las shes su 'od zhes gang yang bcas par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ /'di ni bsrung ba med pa dang po'o/ /de bzhin gshegs pa ni
269b3(mdo 'grel): gsung gi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste /de bzhin gshegs pa la gsung gi sbyong ba yongs su ma dag pa mi mnga' bas la las shes su 'ong zhes gang bca' par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa gnyis pa'o/
269b4(mdo 'grel): de bzhin gshegs pa ni thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs kyi spyod pa yongs su mdag pa yi mnga' bsal las shes su 'ong ngo zhes gang yang bcas par dgongs pa de bzhin gshegs pa la mi mnga' 
269b5(mdo 'grel): ste/ 'di ni bsrung ba med pa gsum pa'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos ston pa'i tshe/ la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan zhing bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar
269b6(mdo 'grel): gzhog pa dang /chos dang gnyer ba'i chos la nan tan du byed na yang des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes par mi 'gyur/ yid bde bar mi 'gyur/ thugs yed yed por mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa dang po'o/ /la la rna
269b7(mdo 'grel): ba btud de/ rim grong nyan zhing bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhog pa med pa dang/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos nan tan du mi byed na yang des de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs khro bar mi 'gyur/ mi bzod par mi 'gyur/ thugs mi ches par
270a1(mdo 'grel): mi 'gyur te/ 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gnyis pa'o/ /la la rna ba btud de rim gror nyan zhing bka' mnyan ba'i sems nye bar gzhog la chos dang gnyer ba'i chos
270a2(mdo 'grel): nan tan du byed/ la la rna ba btud de rim grong? mi byed cing /bka' mnyan pa'i sems nye bar gzhag par mi byed de/ chos dang gnyer ba'i chos nan tan du mi byed kyang/ des de bzhin gshegs pa dgyes pa'am/ thugs khro bar
270a3(mdo 'grel): mi 'gyur te/ thams cad du dgongs pa ldan zhing mkhyen par btang snyoms su rnam par spyod pa 'di ni dgongs pa nye bar gzhag pa gsum pa'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid gang zhe na/ gang gis
270a4(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams don yod pa'i chos ston pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi don mdzad pa la dus las mi 'da' ste/ de ni nyams pa med pa'i chos nyid ces bya'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs
270a5(mdo 'grel): pa'i bag chags kyi sgrib pa rab tu sgrangs pa gang zhe na/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad ni nyon mongs pa spangs kyang lus kyi 'gyur ba yod kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa la ni de lta bu yang mi mnga' ste/ de ni bag chags
270a6(mdo 'grel): kyi sgrib pa rab tu spangs ba zhes bya'o/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po gang dang ldan pas 'jig rten gyi brda nye bar bzung ste/ dge ba'i rtsa ba gzigs pa'i phyir dus
270a7(mdo 'grel): thams cad du 'jig rten la nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du rtog pa mdzad pa ces bya ba ste/ dngos su na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi thugs rje chen po sems can mdza' yas pa yongs su smin par bya ba la gzigs pa
270b1(mdo 'grel): rtag par 'byung ste/ de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje chen po zhes bya'o/ /rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad gang zhe na/ de bzhin gshegs pa la 'khrul pa mi mnga' ba'o/ /ca co mi mnga' 'o/
270b2(mdo 'grel): dgongs pa nyams pa mi mnga' 'o/ /'du shes sna tshogs mi mnga' 'o/ /thugs mnyam par ma gzhag ba mi mnga' 'o/ /ma brtags pa'i btang snyoms mi mnga' 'o/ /mos pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o/ /brtson 'grus yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o//
270b3(mdo 'grel): dran pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o/ /ting nge 'dzin yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' 'o/ /shes rab yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' o/ /rnam par grol ba yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' o/ /rnam par grol ba'i ye shes gzigs pa yongs su nyams pa mi mnga' o//
270b4(mdo 'grel): sku'i phrin las thams cad ye shes sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /gsung gi phrin las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro ba ste/ ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /thugs kyi phrin las thams cad ye shes kyi sngon du 'gro ste/ ye
270b5(mdo 'grel): shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o/ /'das pa'i dus la mchags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs la 'jug go/ ma 'ongs pa'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye shes gzigs pa la 'jug go/ de ltar byung ba'i dus la ma chags ma thogs pa'i ye
270b6(mdo 'grel): shes gzigs pa la 'jug ste/ de dag ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa rnams so/ /rab 'byor de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid gang zhe na/ gang la dmigs pa med pa dran pas dbang sgyur ba zhi ba'i rnam pa dang lan pa mtshan nyid
270b7(mdo 'grel): med pa'i mtshan nyid ni rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ces bya'o// //bam po drug cu bdun pa/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis gang zhe na/ phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan
271a1(mdo 'grel): dang ldan pa dang/ zhabs shin tu gnas pa dang/ phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba dang/ phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang/ bdun shin du mtho ba dang/ sor mo ring ba dang/ rting pa yangs pa dang/
271a2(mdo 'grel): sku chi zhing drang ba dang/ zhabs legs par mtho ba dang/ yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba dang/ ri dags e Ne ya'i byin pa lta bu dang/ phyag brla drang por slebs pa dang/ gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa dang/ gser gyi kha dog
271a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ mdog shin du 'jam pa dang/ spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang/ zhal mdzad spus brgyan pa dang/ seng+ge'i po stong lta bu dang/ phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa dang/ phrag so shin du rgyas pa dang /ro phro pa'i mchog dang/ shing
271a4(mdo 'grel): n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang/ dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa dang/ ljags shin tu yangs pa dang/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang/ seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu dang/ tshems shin tu dkar ba dang/ tshems mnyam pa dang/ tshems thag bzang ba dang
271a5(mdo 'grel): tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba dang/ spyan dkar nag 'byes pa dang/ ba'i rdzim lta bu ste/ de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag dang zhabs kyi mthil la 'khor lo rtsibs stong dang ldan pa/ mu khyud can lte ba dang bcas pa rnam pa thabs
271a6(mdo 'grel): cad yongs su rdzogs pa 'di lta ste/ rus pa'am/ ba sol gzugs su brkos pa dang 'dra ba mnga' bas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mched dang ldan pa'o/ /zhabs kyi mthil gnyis mnyam par sa la 'dzag zhing zhabs zhum pa med pas zhabs?
271a7(mdo 'grel): shin tu gnas pa'o/ /dang pa'i rgyal po ltr phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo dra bas 'drel bas phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba'o/ /shing bal gyi sgo nga ltar shin du 'jam zhing gzhon pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa'o/ /phyag dang zhabs dang mgur gyi lhun shin tu
271b1(mdo 'grel): ma thobs bdun shin tu mtho ba'o/ /phyag dang zhabs kyi sor mo ring bas sor mo ring ba'o/ /rting ba ring bas rting pa yangs pa'o/ /sku khru bdun du 'phags la drang bas sku che zhing drang ba'o/ /bus mo'i lha dang long bu mdzes par nub pas zhabs
271b2(mdo 'grel): legs par mtho ba'o/ /spu gyen du g.yas phyogs su 'khyili bas yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba'o/ /ri dags e Ne ya'i byin pa dang /smyig ma dang ldum bu dang ba ltar drang zhing ma nyams la rims kyis gzhol bar grub cing byin pa zlum pas
271b3(mdo 'grel): ri dags e Ne 'i byin pa lta bu'o/ /brla drang por bzhag ste ma btud kyang phyag gi mthil gnyis kyis bus mo'i ltar la reg pas phyag bral drang por slebs pa'o/ /glang po dang/ rta cang shes ltar gsang ba'i gnas shin du mdzes shing spub su nub
271b4(mdo 'grel): pas gsang ba'i gnas sbubs su nub pa'o/ /shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser gyi kha dog lta bu dang ldan pas gser gyis kha dog go/ gser dang dngul shin du spyangs pa ltar 'jam zhing gzhon pa'i mdog tu 'dug la sku la rdul gyis mi 'og bas kha
271b5(mdo 'grel): dog shin tu 'jam pa'o/ /rnam par phye ba'i slu re rer skyes shing gnyis su med pas spu re re nas g.yas phyogs su 'khyil pa'o/ /me tog kun ? dang 'am dang/ ba mo'i mdog ltar 'dug la nyi ma dang zla ba brgya las kyang 'phags par 'od gsal
271b6(mdo 'grel): ba'i mdzod spus smin mtshams shin tu brgyan pas zhal mdzes spus brgyan pa'o/ /ro stong che bas seng ge'i ro stong go/ /mgur dang rgyud legs par 'brel zhing lhun zlum pas phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa'o/ /gser gyi gtan pa
271b7(mdo 'grel): shin tu phyis ba ltar phrag so legs par grub pas phrag so shin tu legs par rgyas pa'o/ /rlung dang mkhris pa dang bad kan gyis mnyams shing rnam par shing? pa 'dra ba med pas ri bro ba'i mchog go/ sku chu zheng 'dom du mnyam pas
272a1(mdo 'grel): shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa'o/ /spyi gtsug zlum zhing legs la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan pa'i dbu mnyam zhing legs par grub la mdzes pa mnga' bas dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa'o/ /me tog
272a2(mdo 'grel): u twa la dmar po'i 'dab ma'i mdog ltar 'dug cing shin tu yongs pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa'o/ /tshangs pa dang ka la bing ka lta bu'i gsung mnga' bas tshangs pa'i dbyangs so/ /'gram pa me long gi dkyil 'khor ltar legs
272a3(mdo 'grel): par grub cing mdzes par skyes te/ yid du 'ong bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu'o/ /me tog kun da dang dung gi bcag 'phro ltar shin tu dkar ba'i tshems mnga' bas tshems shin du dkar ba'o/ /tshams la mtho dman med pas tshams
272a4(mdo 'grel): mnyam pa'o/ /tshems la mtshams mdod pas tshems thags bzang ba'o/ /bla 'og dgye dgu med pas tshems mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshad ba'o/ /dkar nag gi cha ma 'dres la shin tu rnam par dag cing mdog dmar pos ma g.yos
272a5(mdo 'grel): pas spyan dkar nag 'byes pa'o/ /rdzib bla 'og shin du legs par gnas lam 'dzings pas ba'i rdzims lta bu'o/ /de la bla ma la bsu skyel dang/ chos nyan pa la bstod pa dang/ gtsug lag khang dang/ mchod rten la sogs
272a6(mdo 'grel): ba'i bsti stang byas bas phyag dang zhabs 'khor lo'i mtshan dang ldan pa ste/ de ni 'khor shin tu mang ba'i snga ltas so/ /yid dam la brtan pas zhabs shin tu gnas pa ste/ de ni mi g.yo zhing shin tu brtan pa'i snga lhas? so/ /sbyin
272a7(mdo 'grel): pa dang /ngag snyan pa dang/ don sbyong pa dang/ don mthun pa'i bsdu ba rnam pa bzhi goms par byas pas/ phyag dang zhabs dra bas 'brel ba ste/ de ni myur du 'du ba'i snga ltas so/ /bza' ba dang bca' ba dang btung ba zhim zhing nyams su
272b1(mdo 'grel): bde ba byin pas phyag dang zhabs gzhon zhing 'jam pa dang/ bdun shin tu mtho ba ste/ de gnyis ni bza' ba dang btung ba zhim zhing nyams su bde ba thob pa'i snga ltas so/ /bcings pa bkrol ba dang /srog gi rim gro byas pa dang srog gcod
272b2(mdo 'grel): pa spangs pas/ sor mo ring ba dang /rting pa yangs pa dang sku che zhing drang ba ste/ de ni sku tshe? ring ba'i snga ltas so/ /dge ba'i chos yang dag par blangs pa dang bzung ba mngon par spel zhing 'grib par ma byas pas zhabs kyi gong mtho ba dang/
272b3(mdo 'grel): yan lag gi spu gyen du 'khyil ba ste/ de ni mi nyams pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i snga ltas so/ rig pa dang bzo'i las rim gror byas shing gzhan la byin pa dang/ bdag gis blangs pas ri dwags e Ne ya'i byin pa lta bu ste/ de ni myur du
272b4(mdo 'grel): 'dzin pa'i snga ltas so/ /bdag cing yod pa'i nor la bslangs na mi 'gor bar gtong zhing med ces ma byas pas phyag brla drang por slebs pa ste/ de ni yo byad pa dbang ba dang dul ba'i snga ltas so/ /'grogs pa dang mdza' bshes gnyen pa ma phye
272b5(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ bye bar gyur pa'i sems can rnams tshangs pa'i spyod pa ma yang dag par bskul ba dang/ gsang ba'i tshig yongs su bsrungs pas gsang ba'i gnas spub su nub pa ste/ de ni bu mang ba'i snga ltas so/ /stan dang gos dang ? gzhal med
272b6(mdo 'grel): khang dang/ gnas bzang po byin pas gser gyi kha dog dang mdog shin tu 'jam pa ste/ de gnyis ni gdan dang na bza' dang/ khang pa dang gzhal med khang dang gnas bzang po 'thob pa'i snga ltas so/ /'du 'dzi spangs pa dang/ mkhan
272b7(mdo 'grel): po dang/ slob dpon dang/ 'a ma dang pho nu la sogs pa bla ma rnams la tshul dang 'dra bar rim gror byas pa dang/ btsun par byas pa dang/ bsgo ba rna lam gzan pas spu re re nas gnas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang zhal mdzod spus brgyan pa ste/ de ni
273a1(mdo 'grel): mnyam pa med pa'i snga ltas so/ /mi snyan pa mi zer zhing mi smod la snyan par smra zhing legs par bshad pa mthun par 'dzin pas seng ge'i ngo stong lta bu dang phrag pa'i lhun mdzes par grub pa ste/ de ni thub pa
273a2(mdo 'grel): med pa'i snga ltas so/ /na ba rnams la rtsi dang rim gro dang sman dang nyams su phan pa'i zas byin pa dang/ rim gror byas pas phrag so shin tu rgyas pa dang/ ro bro ba'i mchog ste/ de ni nang nyung ba'i snga ltas so/ /skyed mos tshal dang/ 'khor dang?
273a3(mdo 'grel): ltung ba dang/ rdzing bu dang/ brgal dka' ba'i zam pa dang/ kha zas dang/ phreng ba'i gnas dang/ stegs dang/ gtsug lag khang bya ba la sogs pa la gzhan mos par bya ba sngon du gtong zhing bdag gis? gzhan la byin pas
273a4(mdo 'grel): shing n+ya gro d+ha ltar chu zheng gab pa dang/ dbu spyi gtsug dang ldan pa ste/ de ni mnga' chen po mnga' ba'i snga ltas so/ /yun ring por tshig snyan zhing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde pas smras pas ljags shin tu yangs shing srab pa dang tshangs pa'i
273a5(mdo 'grel): dbyangs te/ de gnyis ni yan lag lnga dang ldan pa'i gsung mnga' ba'i snga ltas so/ /gsung yan lag lnga dang ldan pa zhes bya ba ni/ yongs su shes shing rnam par shes par gyur pa dang/ mnyan na dga' zhing mi mthun pa med pa dang/ zab
273a6(mdo 'grel): cing dbyangs rjes su 'byung ba dang/ btang mi bra zhing rnar snyan pa dang/ ma 'khrugs shing gsal ba'o/ /yun ring po nas tshig 'khyal pa spangs shing dus su smra smra bas seng ge'i 'gram pa lta bu ste/ de ni tshig kun gyis snyan pa'i snga ltas?
273a7(mdo 'grel): rim gror bya ba dang brnyas pa med pa gnyis kyis 'tsho ba yongs su dag pas tshems shin tu dkar ba dang mnyam pa ste/ de ni 'khor snga nas bsags pa'i snga ltas so/ /yun ring? po nas bden zhing phra ma med pa'i tshig smra smra bas tshems thag
273b1(mdo 'grel): bzang ba dang/ tshems? mnyam zhing bzhi bcu tshang ba ste/ de ni 'khor dbyer mi phyed pa'i snga ltas so/ /dbang gis 'khyud pa bzhin du nyes par bsams pa med pa la ma chags shing mi ldang pa dang/ rmongs pa med pa'i mig gis lta lta bas spyan dkar
273b2(mdo 'grel): nags 'byes pa dang/ ba'i rdzim lta bu ste de ni kun nas mdzes pa'i snga ltas so/ /rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mi chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis so/ /de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/
273b3(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mngon par 'du bya ba thams cad las dben pa ste/ sen mo zangs kyi mdog ltar 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gnyen bshes byams pa dang 'dra bar sems can la phan pa rang bde pa'i thu
273b4(mdo 'grel): mnga' ba ste/ sen mo mdog snam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rigs dang rgyud mthon par byung ba ste/ sen mo mtho ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul kha na mtho ba mi mnga' ba ste/ sor mo zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas
273b5(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu tshogs pa ste/ sor mo rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba rim gyis grub pa ste/ sor mo rin gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs dang
273b6(mdo 'grel): gsung dang sku'i phrin las dang 'tsho ba shin tu dben pa ste/ rtsa mi mngon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i mdud pa 'grol ba ste /rtsa mdung pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin tu dben pa'i
273b7(mdo 'grel): chos mnga' bsta?/ long bu mi mngon ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi mnyam pa thams cad las sgrol ba ste/ zhabs mnyam pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i seng ge ste/ seng ge'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/
274a1(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ma'i glang po ste/ glang po che'i 'gros su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni ngang pa'i rgyal po ltar nam mkha' la bzhud pa ste/ ngang ba'i stabs su bzhud pa yin/
274a2(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi'i khyu mchog ste/ khyu mchog gi stabs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun ba'i lam mnga' ba ste/ g.yas phyogs su bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni
274a3(mdo 'grel): blta na mdzes pa ste/ mdzes par de bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu thugs yon po mi mnga' ba ste/ ma yo bar bzhud pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni tshul rnam par dag pa'i yon tan ston pa ste/ sku
274a4(mdo 'grel): shin tu legs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sdig pa'i chos thams cad shin tu sbyangs ba ste/ sku shin tu sbyangs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos rim gyis ston pa ste/ sku rim gyis gzhol ba
274a5(mdo 'grel): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sku dang gsung dang thugs gtsang ma dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin du gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis 'jam pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/ sku shin du 'jam pa yin/
274a6(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dag pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku shin du rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin du rdzogs pa ste/ dpe byad shin tu rdzogs pa yin/
274a7(mdo 'grel): sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan yangs shing bzang po ston pa ste/ sku che zhing mdzas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ sku legs par mnyam pa yin/ sangs
274b1(mdo 'grel): rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin du 'jam ba'i chos ston pa ste/ sku shin du gzhon pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu zhum pa med pa'i thugs mnga' ba ste/ su zhum pa med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mi dge
274b2(mdo 'grel): pa'i rtsa ba thams cad byang ba ste/ sku shin du rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yang 'byung ba shin tu bcom zhing zad pa ste/ sku shin tu mkhregs pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rten cing 'brel bar 'byung
274b3(mdo 'grel): ba'i yan lag dang nyid lag legs par ston pa ste/ yan lag dang nyid lag spa bar mdzes pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin tu dag pa ste/ snang ba rab rib med cing rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
274b4(mdo 'grel): 'das rnams ni tshul dang ldan pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ phyal zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'khor ba'i nyes pa thams cad shin tu sbyangs pa ste/ phyal shin tu byang ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
274b5(mdo 'grel): rnams ni nga rgyal gyi de'u bcom pa ste/ phyal ma zhom pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zad pa rnam par bzlog pa ste/ phyal phyam med 'dug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos zab mo shin du thugs su chud pa ste/
274b6(mdo 'grel): lta ba zab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthun bar 'dzin pa'i slob ma mnga' ba ste/ lte ba g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni slob ma kun nas mdzes pa'i dge 'dun mnga' ba ste/ kun nas mdzes
274b7(mdo 'grel): pa yin sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs shin du gtsang ba dang ldan pa ste/ kun du spyod pa shin du gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos nag po bstan pa dang bral ba'i chos dang 'dul ba mnga' ba ste/ sku la sme
275a1(mdo 'grel): ba med pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shing bal ltar rab tu yang ba rab tu 'thob ba'i chos ston pa ste/ phyag shing ba la ltar 'jam ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rang gi skye
275a2(mdo 'grel): bo dang skye bo bal la byams pas dge sbyong chen po mnyes pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo snum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni shin du zab cing brtan par bzhugs pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo zab ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnamS
275a3(mdo 'grel): ni bzod pa'i chos yangs pa ston pa ste/ phyag gi ri mo ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bslab pa'i gnas ha cang yang mi ring bar 'cha' ba ste/ zhal ha cang mi ring ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzugs
275a4(mdo 'grel): brnyan 'jig rten du skye ba ste/ zhal gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan snang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam pa sngon du btang zhing 'dul ba ste/ ljags shin du 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yon tan
275a5(mdo 'grel): phra ba'i tshogs dang ldan pa ste/ ljags shin du srab pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni byis pa so so'i skye bo 'dod chags pa rnams kyis chos dang 'dul ba gting dpag par dka' ba ste/ ljags shin tu dmar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom
275a6(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das rnams ni glang po'i sgra dang 'brug go sgra lta bus bsnyengs ba mi mnga' ba ste/ glang po'i nga ro dang/ 'brug gi sgra dbyangs dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni snyan zhing 'jam pa dang/ nyams su bde bar smra ba'i slob ma
275a7(mdo 'grel): mnga' ba ste/ snyan zhing 'jam pa dang nyams su bde ba dang ldan pa'i gsung dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni srid par kun du sbyor ba las 'das pa ste/ tshams shin du mche ba zlum pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
275b1(mdo 'grel): rnams ni skye bo rno ba rnams 'dul ba ste/ tshems mche ba rno ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos dang 'dul ba shin tu dkar pa ste/ tshems mche ba shin du dkar ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sa'i
275b2(mdo 'grel): phyogs mnyam ba la bzhugs pa ste/ tshems mche ba mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rim gyis mngon par rtogs pa'i chos ston pa ste/ tshems mche ba rim gyis gzhol ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
275b3(mdo 'grel): 'das rnams ni shes rab gyi ri bo mthon bo la bzhugs pa ste/ shangs legs par mtho ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'dul ba'i skye bo gtsang ba mnga' ba ste/ shangs shin tu gtsang ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan
275b4(mdo 'grel): 'das rnams ni sangs rgyas kyi chos phul du yangs pa mnga' ba ste/ spyan ring ba dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni gzigs pa shin du rnam par dag pa ste/ spyan rnam par dag pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams
275b5(mdo 'grel): ni sems can gyi tshogs shin tu bsags pa ste/ rdzim stug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lha dang lha ma yin dang skyes bu na chung mchog mig dkar nag 'byes shing padmo'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug pa rnams kyis mngon par dag
275b6(mdo 'grel): par byas pa ste/ spyan dkar nag 'byes shing pad+ma'i 'dab ma ltar 'dug ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu yangs par gzigs pa ste/ smin ma ring ba dang ldan ba yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni 'jam par 'dul
275b7(mdo 'grel): ba la mkhas pa ste/ smin ma 'jam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni skyon thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ smin ma'i spu mnyam pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba'i snum gyis sems
276a1(mdo 'grel): can snum par 'gyur pa'i skye bo 'dul ba ste/ smin pa snum pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni chos mchog tu yangs shing don dang ldan mnga' ba ste/ snyan shal legs shing snyan shal ring ba
276a2(mdo 'grel): yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni nyon mongs pa'i rgyud las rnam par rgyal ba ste/ snyan mnyam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni sems can bsam pa ma nyams pa 'dul ba ste/ snyan gyi dbang po mnyams pa dang
276a3(mdo 'grel): ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad yongs su sbyangs ba ste/ zhal 'phral bas legs par grub pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bas kyi rgol ba shin du 'dul ba ste/ zhal
276a4(mdo 'grel): 'phral ba yangs pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni smon lam dam ba shin du rdzogs pa ste/ dbu shin du rgyas pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni yul gyi bung ba rnam par bzlog pa ste/ dbu skra bung pa
276a5(mdo 'grel): ltar gnag pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mthong ba dang sgom pas spangs pa'i lag la nyal bzang par byas pa ste/ dbu skra stug pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni thugs 'jam pas bstan pa'i snying
276a6(mdo 'grel): po thugs su chud pa ste/ dbu skra 'jam pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni rtag tu ma 'khrugs pa'i thugs dang ldan pa ste/ dbu skra ma 'dzings pa dang ldan pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni brlang ba'i gsung dang yongs su bral
276a7(mdo 'grel): ba ste/ dbu skra mi rtsub pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rtsas? ni byang chub kyi yan lag spos kyis me tog gis skye bo mthun par bsgrubs pa ste/ dbu skra dri zhim pa yin/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni phyag dang zhabs dpal gyi be'u dang/ bkra shis
276b1(mdo 'grel): dang/ g.yung drung 'khyil pas brgyan pa yin te/ rab 'byor de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi dpe byed bzang po brgyad cu'o/ /rab 'byor de lta bu'i chos kyi rnam pa de dag gzhan la bshad pa dang/ bstan pa dang/
276b2(mdo 'grel): yang dag par bstan pa de ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa zhes bya ste/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems can rnams zang zing gi sbyin pa dang/ chos kyi sbyin pas sdud pa yin te/ rab 'byor 'di ni byang
276b3(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' 
276b4(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug gis sems can rnams sdud pa yin te/ 'di ltar sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam
276b5(mdo 'grel): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa drug po 'di dag gis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan par smra bar sems can rnams sdud do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar pha
276b6(mdo 'grel): rol tu phyin pa drug pa 'di dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig snyan par smra bas sems can rnams sdud do/ /rab 'byor ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' 
276b7(mdo 'grel): sems dpa' chen po don bya bas sems can thams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po/ de dag gis don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do/ /de ci'i phyi
277a1(mdo 'grel): zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni don bya bas sems can rnams sdud do/ /rab 'byor
277a2(mdo 'grel): ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can rnams sdud pa yin zhe na/ rab 'byor 'di la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis don mthun pas sems can rnams
277a3(mdo 'grel): sdud do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar pha rol tu phyin pa drug po de dag gis dge ba'i chos thams cad ma 'dus pa med de/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po don mthun pas sems can sdud do/ /rab 'byor de yang
277a4(mdo 'grel): byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi de mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos so zhes bya ba ni bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhi la 'god pa'i phrin las yin no/ /rab 'byor gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes
277a5(mdo 'grel): rab kyi pha rol phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzhan dag la 'di skad du 'doms shing 'di skad du ston te/ rigs kyi bu khyod tshur shog yi ge mngon par sgrub pa la mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig la
277a6(mdo 'grel): mkhas par gyis shig/ yi ge gnyis nas yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas par gyis shig /yi ge gcig gi byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig /yi ge gnyis kyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes
277a7(mdo 'grel): bar gyis shig /yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar gyis byang ba'i rang bzhin thams cad shes par gyis shig/ yi ge gcig tu yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par sgoms shig/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par
277b1(mdo 'grel): sgoms shig ces chos ston to/ /rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de yang yi ge gcig la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis kyi bar la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge gcig gi nang du yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis 'dus par
277b2(mdo 'grel): bsgoms pa la mkhas pa yin/ yi ge bzhi bcu rtsa gnyis su yi ge gcig 'dus par bsgom pa la mkhas pa yin te/ de de ltar yi ge mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par bya na/ lam la goms shing yi ge med par mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas
277b3(mdo 'grel): pa yin no/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzoD ba'i sangs rgyas chos la mkhas pa dang yi ge la mkhas pa yin te/ chos la mkhas pa dang yi ge la mkhas pas yi ge mang pos yi ge med pa'i chos ston kyang/
277b4(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor chos de yi ge'i rnam pa dang bral ba yang ma yin te/ rab 'byor de yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos te/ gang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad thun mong ma yin pa'o/ /
277b5(mdo 'grel): de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te mdza' las 'das pa dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid nye bar bzung ste/ sems can yang shin du mi dmigs/ chos kyang mi
277b6(mdo 'grel): dmigs/ chos kyi dngos po yang mi dmigs pa lags na/ bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/
277b7(mdo 'grel): bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa dang/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi
278a1(mdo 'grel): chos sum cu rtsa bdun la spyod pa dang/ stong pa nyid bcu bzhi la spyod pa dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin la spyod pa dang/ rnam par thar ba brgyad la spyod pa dang/ mthar gyis gnaS
278a2(mdo 'grel): pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad dang/
278a3(mdo 'grel): skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang/ dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu la spyod cing/ rnam par smin pa las byung ba'i mngon par shes pa drug la gnas nas sems can rnams la chos ston par 'gyur/ de la ni sems can mi dmigs te/
278a4(mdo 'grel): sems can du gdags pa'ang mi dmigs so/ /sems can mi dmigs pas gzugs dmigs su ma mchis so/ /sems can mi dmigs pas tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa dmigs su ma mchis so/ /sems
278a5(mdo 'grel): can mi dmigs pas sangs rgyas kyis? 'dres pa bco brgyud kyi bar du dmigs su ma mchis so/ /sems can mi dmigs pas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen nyid kyi bar du dmigs su ma mchis so/ /sems can mi dmigs pas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan
278a6(mdo 'grel): sum cu rtsa gnyis dmigs su ma mchis so/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu dmigs su ma mchis so/ /sems can dmigs su ma mchis pa la ni sems can ma mchis so/ /gzugs ma mchis so/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam
278a7(mdo 'grel): par shes pa ma mchis so/ /sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad kyi bar du ma mchis so/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma mchis so/ /skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis ma mchis so/ /dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu
278b1(mdo 'grel): ma mchis so/ /de ci'i slad du zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ byang chub sems dpa' nyid kyang mi dmigs na/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos rnams
278b2(mdo 'grel): dmigs par 'gyur pa lta ga la mchis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ ji skad du smra ba bzhin no/ /rab 'byor de ltar na sems can mi dmigs pas nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /phyi stong
278b3(mdo 'grel): pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /phyi nang stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi bar du rig par bya'o/ /phung po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /khams stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /skye mched stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /rten
278b4(mdo 'grel): cing 'brel bar 'gyur ba stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /bden pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /bdag stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /sems can stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /srog dang/ 'gro ba dang/ gso ba dang/ skyes bu dang/ gang zag dang shed
278b5(mdo 'grel): can dang/ shed bdag dang/ byed pa po dang/ byed du 'jug pa po dang/ slong ba po dang/ kun nas slong ba po dang/ tshor ba po dang/ tshor bar byed pa po dang/ shes pa po dang/ mthong ba po stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /dran pa nye bar gzhag ba stong
278b6(mdo 'grel): pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /yang dag par spong ba dang/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa dang/ dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ 'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /'phags pa'i bden pa dang/ bsam
278b7(mdo 'grel): gtan dang/ tshad med pa dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ rnal par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs
279a1(mdo 'grel): pa'i stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag bar rig pa bzhi dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /rgyun
279a2(mdo 'grel): du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong pa'i 'bras bu dang/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /lam gyi rnam par shes pa nyid dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen
279a3(mdo 'grel): pa nyid stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /sangs rgyas stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /byang chub seMs dpa' stong pa nyid du rig par bya'o/ /rab 'byor de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
279a4(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag thams cad stong par mthong nas/ phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can rnams la chos ston te/ ji ltar stong ba nyid de dag la yang mi 'jug pa de ltar ston to/ /des de ltar mthong nas
279a5(mdo 'grel): chos thams cad sgrib pa med par shes te/ chos gang la yang 'khrug par mi byed gnyis su mi byed de/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du yang ston par byed do/ /rab 'byor 'di lta ste dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa ni sprul pa bye ba phrag du
279a6(mdo 'grel): mar sprul zhing sems can la la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu yin pa la sbyor/ la la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la bsam gtan gyi
279a7(mdo 'grel): pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor/ la la bsam gtan bzhi la/ la la tshad med pa bzhi la/ la la gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi la sbyor/ la la byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la sbyor /
279b1(mdo 'grel): la la 'phags pa'i bden pa bzhi dang/ la la rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ la la mthar gyis pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu dang/ la la stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ la la mngon par shes pa lnga la sbyor/ la la ting nge
279b2(mdo 'grel): 'dzin thams cad dang/ la la gzungs kyi sgo thams cad la sbyor/ la la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang/ la la mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ la la so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ la la byams pa chen po dang/ la la snying rje chen po dang/ la
279b3(mdo 'grel): la sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la sbyor/ la la rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la sbyor/ la la lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ la la phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ la la dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ la la rang byang chub la sbyor/ la la
279b4(mdo 'grel): rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar la sbyor na/ rab 'byor de la ji snyam du sems/ sprul pa des chos la la zhig tha dad du phye ba yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin
279b5(mdo 'grel): du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos ston te/ de dag phyin ci log rnams las yongs su bkrol nas ma bcings ma grol ba'i tshul du yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin
279b6(mdo 'grel): du rab tu 'god do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor de ni 'di ltar gzugs ma bcings ma grol ba dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa rnams ma bcings ma grol ba/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du ma
279b7(mdo 'grel): bcings ma grol ba ste/ gzugs kyi ma bcings ma grol ba gang yin pa de ni gzugs ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa'i ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de/ rnam par shes pa ma yin no/ /rnam pa
280a1(mdo 'grel): thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar gyi ma bcings ma grol ba nyid gang yin pa de rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid ma yin no/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gzugs ni shin du rnam par dag pa'o/ /tshor ba dang/
280a2(mdo 'grel): 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar ni shin tu rnam par dag pa'o/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol
280a3(mdo 'grel): tu phyin pa la spyod ba'i tshe/ sems can rnams la chos ston kyang sems can du mi dmigs so/ /byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni chos thams cad mi dmigs pa la de mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/ gzugs stong pa nyid kyi dmigs
280a4(mdo 'grel): pa'i tshul dang/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul dang/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du stong pa nyid mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis gnas te/ 'dus byas dang
280a5(mdo 'grel): 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams ni gang la yang gnas pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar gang la gnas par bya ba de lta bu'i ngo bo nyid mi dmigs te/ dngos po med pa la dngos po med pa mi gnas so/ /rang bzhin la rang bzhin mi gnas so/ /
280a6(mdo 'grel): gzhan gyi dngos po la gzhan gyi dngos po mi gnas so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar de dag thams cad dmigs su med de/ gang dmigs su med pa de ni gang la gang mi gnas so/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab
280a7(mdo 'grel): kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ chos de dag thams cad stong ba nyid thams cad kyis rab tu 'byed de/ rab 'byor shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la de ltar spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
280b1(mdo 'grel): rnams dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang/ rang sangs rgyas rnams dang/ nyan thos rnams dang/ 'phags pa thams cad kyi skyon du mi bya'o/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang/ byang
280b2(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag dang/ rang sangs rgyas de dag dang/ nyan thos de dag gis kyang chos nyid de rjes su rtogs te/ chos nyid de rjes su rtogs nas kyang sems can rnams la chos ston te/ de'ang chos rnams kyi chos nyid las mi 'de'o/
280b3(mdo 'grel): de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rab 'byor chos kyi dbyings ni 'da' ba med do/ /de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mdza' ni 'da' ba med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de dag la'ang 'da' bar 'gyur ba'i rang bzhin med do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das
280b4(mdo 'grel): la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar chos kyi dbyings la 'da' ba yang ma mchis/ de bzhin nyid dang yang dag pa'i mdza' la'ang 'da' ba ma mchis na/ ci lags 'o na gzugs kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de
280b5(mdo 'grel): bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag ba'i mdza' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mdza' yang gzhan
280b6(mdo 'grel): zhig lags sam/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag ba'i mdza' yang gzhan zhig lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma
280b7(mdo 'grel): yin no/ /gzugs kyang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag ba'i mdza' yang gzhan ma yin no/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la chos kyi dbyings kyang
281a1(mdo 'grel): gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan yang dag pa'i mdza' yang gzhan ma yin no/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan gyi chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ /de bzhin nyid kyang
281a2(mdo 'grel): gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mdza' yang gzhan ma yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar gzugs kyang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang ngag pa'i mdza' yang gzhan ma lags/ tshor ba
281a3(mdo 'grel): dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa yang gzhan la/ chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mdza' yang gzhan ma lags/ rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar yang gzhan la/
281a4(mdo 'grel): chos kyi dbyings kyang gzhan/ de bzhin nyid kyang gzhan/ yang dag pa'i mdza' yang gzhan ma lags na/ 'o na ji ltar chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par 'god cing nag po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa nag po ni sems can dmyal
281a5(mdo 'grel): ba dang/ byol song gi skye gnas dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten dkar po'i chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar po ni lha dang mi dkar nag gi chos rnams kyi rnam par smin pa dkar nag ni bde ba dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba/ mi gnag cing dkar ba'i
281a6(mdo 'grel): chos kyi rnam par smin pa mi gnag cing dkar ba ni rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lan cig phyir 'od pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lan cig phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzoD
281a7(mdo 'grel): pa'i byang chub po zhes bgyi bar rnam par dgod par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor kun rdzob kyi bden pa tshad mar byas te/ 'bras bu rnam par 'god pa bstan gyi/ don dam pa'i bden par ni 'bras bu rnam par
281b1(mdo 'grel): 'god pa bstan par mi nus so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na chos de ni rnam par brtag tu med pa/ tha snyad med pa ste/ 'di ltar ming bden pa dang/ gzugs bden pa dang/ skye ba med pa dang/ 'gag pa med pa dang/ kun nas nyon mongs pa med pa dang/ rnam par byang ba
281b2(mdo 'grel): med pa ste/ 'di ni mdza' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang/ thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid do/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar kun rdzob kyi bden pa nye bar bzung ste/ 'bras bu rnam par 'god pa lags kyi/ don dam pa'i bden pas
281b3(mdo 'grel): ma lags na/ byis pa so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang/ dgra bcom pa nyid dang/ rang byang chub dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu 'gyur ro/ /bcom ldan
281b4(mdo 'grel): 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kun rdzob kyi bden pa 'am/ don dam pa'i bden pa shes sam/ gal te shes na ni de dag kyang rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras buAm/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ phyir
281b5(mdo 'grel): mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'am/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu rnam par 'god par 'gyur na/ rab 'byor byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la lam yang med/ lam rnam par 'god pa
281b6(mdo 'grel): yang med/ lam sgom pa yang med par byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ? la 'bras bu rnam par 'god pa lta ga la 'ong/ /rab 'byor 'phags pa'i gang zag la ni lam yang yod/ lam sgom pa yang yod pas na /de'i phyir 'phags pa'i
281b7(mdo 'grel): gang zag de dag la 'bras bu rnam par 'god pa yod do/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das ci laD lam bsgoms pas 'bras bu 'thob pa'i/ 'bras bu 'thob par bgyid pa mchis sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ni ma yin te/ lam bsgoms
282a1(mdo 'grel): pas 'bras bu 'thob pa'am/ 'bras bu 'thob par bya ba med do/ /rab 'byor lam ma bsgoms par yang 'bras bu 'thob pa med de/ lam gyi 'bras bu 'thob par bya ba yang med do/ /lam lam gnas par yang 'bras
282a2(mdo 'grel): bu thob par mi 'gyur te/ rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ thabs mkhas pas sems can rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par 'god par byed de/ 'dus byas kyi
282a3(mdo 'grel): khams dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi ris su bcad cing 'bras bu rnam par 'god par mi byed do/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das gal te de ltar 'dus byas kyi khams sam 'dus ma byas kyi khams ris su bcad cing 'bras bu rnaM par 'god par ma mchis na/ bcom
282a4(mdo 'grel): ldan 'das 'di ni kun du sbyor ba gsum spangs pas rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu'o/ /'dod pa'i 'dod chags dang gnod sems bsrab pas lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu'o/ /'og ma'i cha can gyi kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i
282a5(mdo 'grel): 'bras bu'o/ /bla ma'i cha can gyi kun du sbyor ba lnga spangs pas dgra bcom pa nyid do/ /gang ci yang rung ste kun 'byung ba'i chos de dag thams cad 'gog pa'i chos can du shes pas rang byang chub bo/ /bag chags kyi mtshams sbyor pa'i nyon
282a6(mdo 'grel): mongs pa thams cad spangs pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub po zhes gsungs na/ bcom ldan 'das ris su bcad cing 'dus byas sam/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams kyi 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa ma mchis na gsungs pa'i don de
282a7(mdo 'grel): bdag gis ji ltar 'tshal bar bgyi/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras buAm/ lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras buAm/ phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras buAm/ dgra bcom pa nyid dam/ rang byang chub bam/ bla na
282b1(mdo 'grel): med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dus byas sam/ 'on te 'dus ma byas pa yin/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'o/ /bde bar gshegs pa de ni 'dus ma bgyis pa'o/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa
282b2(mdo 'grel): rab 'byor 'o na 'dus ma byas kyi chos la ris su bcad pa yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ gang gi tshe rigs kyi buAm/ rigs kyi bu me gang la las
282b3(mdo 'grel): 'dus byas sam 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams 'di lta ste/ mtshan nyid med par mtshan nyid gcig tu chud par gyur na/ de'i tshe 'dus byas zhes sam 'dus ma byas zhes chos gang la yang ris su gcad pa yod dam/ gsol ba/ bcom ldan 'das
282b4(mdo 'grel): de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa'i tshe/ 'di lta ste/ nang stong pa nyid dang/ dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid kyi
282b5(mdo 'grel): bar du nye bar bzung ste/ sems can rnams la rims su bcad pa'i chos mi ston to/ /de dag kyang sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bsam
282b6(mdo 'grel): gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/ bsam gtan dang po 'am/ bsam gtan gnyis pa'am/ bsam gtan gsum pa'am/ bsam gtan bzhi pa'am/ byams pa'am/ snying rdza'am/ dga' ba'am/ btang snyoms
282b7(mdo 'grel): sam/ nam mkha' mdza' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'am/ rnam shes mdza' yas skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa 'am/ cung zad med pa'i skye mched kyi snyoms par 'jug pa'am/ 'du shes med 'du shes med min skye mched kyi
283a1(mdo 'grel): snyoms par 'jug par 'am/ dran pa nye bar bzhag pa rnams sam/ yang dag par spong ba rnams sam/ rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa rnams sam/ dbang po rnams sam/ stobs rnams sam/ byang chub kyi yan lag rnams sam/
283a2(mdo 'grel): lam 'am/ 'phags pa'i bden pa rnams sam/ bsam gtan rnams sam/ tshad med pa rnams sam/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams sam/ rnam par thab pa rnams sam/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa
283a3(mdo 'grel): rnams sam/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams sam/ ting nge 'dzin rnams sam/ gzungs kyi sgo rnams sam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs rnams sam/ mi 'jigs pa rnams sam/

283a5(mdo 'grel): par zhen pa med pas gang la yang chags pa med do/ /'di lta ste/ dper na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa sbyin pa yongs su gtong yang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la chags pa med de/ sbyin pa'i 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med do/ /gzhan du na sems
283a6(mdo 'grel): nyan thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba' i don du sbyin pa yongs su gtong ngo/ /tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ 
283a7(mdo 'grel): shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang/ zag pa dang bcas pa dang/ zag pa med pa'i chos rnams sam/ 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa rnams dang/ 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams sgom yang/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos
283b1(mdo 'grel): kyi 'bras bu la chags pa med/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos kyi 'bras bu nyams su myong ba med de/ gzhan du na sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba' i don du/ 'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams bsgom mo/ /rab 'byor
283b2(mdo 'grel): de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang/ chos thams cad la spyod de/ chos gang la yang gnas pa'am chags pa med do/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar des chos rnams kyi chos kyi mtshan nyid
283b3(mdo 'grel): shin tu khong du chud pa med do/ /de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/ /bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyi mtshan nyid rab tu rtogs pa lagS/
283b4(mdo 'grel): bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor sprul ba ni 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang gti mug la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /bag la nyal dang kun nas ldang ba la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /phyi nang gi chos thams cad la yongs su spyod pa med do//
283b5(mdo 'grel): zag pa dang bcas pa dang zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas kyi chos rnams la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /gzugs la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/
283b6(mdo 'grel): rnam par shes pa la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /skye mched dang/ khams dang/ rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /pha rol tu phyin pa rnams dang/ stong pa nyid thams cad dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun la
283b7(mdo 'grel): yongs su spyod pa med do/ /'phags pa'i bden pa rnams dang/ bsam gtan rnams dang/ tshad med pa rnams dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa rnams dang/ rnam par thar pa brgyad dang/ mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par
284a1(mdo 'grel): 'jug pa dgu dang/ stong pa nyid dang/ mtshan ma med pa dang/ smon pa med pa dang/ mngon par shes pa rnams pa yongs su spyod pa med do/ /ting nge 'dzin rnams dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnaMs la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /de bzhin gshegs pa'i
284a2(mdo 'grel): stobs bcu dang/ mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang/ so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang/ byams pa chen po dang/ snying rje chen po dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa bco brgyad la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi par
284a3(mdo 'grel): la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /rab 'byor de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po yang chos thams cad la yongs su spyod pa med do/ /rab 'byor de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad kyi mtshan
284a4(mdo 'grel): nyid rab tu rtogs pa yin no// //bam po drug cu brgyad pa/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pas lam bsgoms pa la brten kyang kun nas nyon mongs par mi 'gyur/ rnam par byang bar mi 'gyur la/ 'gro ba
284a5(mdo 'grel): lnga'i 'khor ba na yang mi snang na lam sgom du ci mchis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i spul pa dngos po la la zhig la brten te/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur pa'am/ rnam
284a6(mdo 'grel): par byang bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na snang bar gyur pa de lta bu'i dngos po gang yang yod dam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags te/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pas dngos po la la
284a7(mdo 'grel): zhig la brten te/ kun nas nyon mongs par 'gyur ba 'am/ rnam par byang bar 'gyur ba'am/ 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba na snang bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po de lta bu yang ma mchis/ /bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ltar
284b1(mdo 'grel): na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos rnams kyis chos kyi tshul rab tu rtogs pa yin no/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das ci legs/ gzugs thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams
284b2(mdo 'grel): dang/ rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags sam/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor gzugs thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu'o/ /tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa thams cad ni ?
284b3(mdo 'grel): lta bu'o/ /gsol pa bcom ldan 'das de ltar gzugs thams cad ni sprul pa lta bu/ tshor ba dang/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa thams cad sprul pa lta bu lags na/ bcom ldan 'das sprul pa ni gzugs ma? min ?/
284b4(mdo 'grel): tshor ba ma mchis/ 'du shes dang/ 'du byed rnams dang/ rnam par shes pa ma mchis/ kun nas nyon mongs pa ma mchis/ rnam par byang ba ma mchis/ gang las grol bar 'gyur ba'i 'gro ba lnga'i 'khor ba nam mchis na/ ji ltar na byang
284b5(mdo 'grel): chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyes bu'i byed par 'gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de ji snyam du sems/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa' i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/ sems
284b6(mdo 'grel): can dmyal ba'am/ byol song gi skye gnas sam/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten nam/ lha 'am mi dag las yongs su dgrol bar bya ba'i sems can gang yang dmigs sam/ gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de ni ma lags so/ /bcom ldan 'das
284b7(mdo 'grel): kyis? bka' stsal pa/ rab 'byor de de bzhin no/ /de de bzhin te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po khams gsum nas yongs su grol bar bya pa'i sems can gang yang mi dmigs so/ /de ci'i phyir zhe na/ 'di ltar de ni chos thams cad sgyu
285a1(mdo 'grel): ma lta bur shes so/ /mthong ngo/ /rtogs so/ /sprul pa lta bur shes so/ /mthong ngo/ /rtogs so/ /de ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i skyes bu'i byed par rig par bya'o/ /gsol pa/ bcom ldan
285a2(mdo 'grel): 'das gal te de ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos thams cad sgyu ma lta bu'i 'tshal zhing mthong ste rtogs la/ sprul pa lta bur 'tshal zhing mthong ste rtogs pa lags ma gang gi don du byang chub sems dpa' sems
285a3(mdo 'grel): dpa' chen po pha rol tu phyin pa drug la spyod pa lags/ bsam gtan bzhi dang/ tshad med pa bzhi dang/ gzugs med pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa bzhi dang/ mngon par shes pa lnga dang/ byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun dang/
